dataset_id: CLASIC07 Land Cover Classification Map V001
organizations: National Snow and Ice Data Center
title: CLASIC07 Land Cover Classification Map V001
summary: This data set consists of land cover classification data derived from satellite imagery as part of the Cloud and Land Surface Interaction Campaign 2007 (CLASIC07). ResourceSat-1 AWiFS images of the study area were retrieved for the period of April through August 2007. The land use classification image provides information about vegetation present in the study area at a resolution of 56 meters.
